Subject: Assistance moving Netwrix Auditor, and Intercept to new domain
Description: We recently purchased a new set of licenses for our Broadview domain. We need assistance scoping our infrastructure in the new domain (server configuration / service accounts, etc.). Then we need assistance installing products and then configuring them for the new domain.
What_We_Know__c: Customer wants assistance with setting up NEA
Next_Steps__c: Sent podlink for customer to get scheduled with NEA team.
Solution_Comment__c:
The customer is not planning to migrate any data; he wants to create a new environment with a new DC and SQL server.
I explained to the customer that he would need to follow the new environment's guidelines to ensure proper permission is created for each server.
Since it's a new install, no migration is involved. I will close this ticket, and the customer will open a new ticket when ready to install NEA in the new server.
Account_Name__c: Broadview Federal Credit Union (Formally Capital Communications Federal Credit Union (CAP COM))
